subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Charm's Toybox/D72imheremonique2_CLR.mp3 
  Uploaded by : charmedbyu20032003 <charmedbyu20032003@...> 
  Description : This file was taken last night (May 8-08)- I asked if my spirit friends Peter and Monique if they were around, and Monique says "I'm here" 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Charm%27s%20Toybox/D72imheremonique2_CLR.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

charmedbyu20032003 <charmedbyu20032003@...>
